ModMetaData.name: Wolves Den - Legendary Wolves
ModMetaData.author: RebelRabbit, Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description: Wolves Den is a mod that aims to bring stronger wolves from myths and legends in the game, and be viable in endgame fights. Hopefully over time and with more funding, i will be able to bring in a few different types of wolves with different niches and abilites to help your ultratech bases thrive and survive in those massive mechanoid raids
